snippet: A new production of “Stars of David,” which transforms interviews with Jewish figures into songs, will begin a New York run next month.
abstract: Off-Broadway production of concert musical Stars of David, which transforms interviews with Jewish figures into songs, will begin a New York run at DR2 Theater in November 2013.
lead_paragraph: A new production of “Stars of David,” which transforms interviews with Jewish figures into songs, will begin a New York run next month.

headline.main: ‘Stars of David’ to Return in Concert Form
headline.print_headline: ‘Stars of David’ to Return In Concert Form
